description:
This is the stable initial release with key features.

Major features:
  • GMP fingerprint support
  • PyTorch Geometric integration
  • Skorch integration
  • GPU/Multi-GPU support via DataParallel
  • Weights and Biases logger support
  • Uncertainty quantification support
  • LMDB data storage option
title: ulissigroup/amptorch: Initial Release
